title: CTO
bio: Chris Daden is a dynamic serial entrepreneur from Greater Los Angeles with a proven track record of building and scaling global technology businesses across enterprise software and multiple industries. He has founded and operated four global organizations, led as both CEO and CTO, served on advisory and fiduciary boards, and helped bring more than $100MM in software to market for global enterprises, including Fortune 500 companies. Currently serving as CTO of Criteria, a Talent Success Suite, Chris is helping transform hiring through science-based assessments and structured interviewing that make talent decisions more objective and predictive; the company has raised $65MM+ in growth investment and has been recognized on the Inc. 5000 list for seven consecutive years. A Forbes Councils contributor and recognized thought leader, his work spans industries including energy, HR, finance, and automotive, and he is also deeply committed to mentoring entrepreneurs, empowering youth, and advising startups and social ventures focused on emerging technologies, the future of work, and the UN Sustainable Development Goals.
